RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 400 Y Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CURLIE JESS clear early, best. ROYAL POST chased, couldn't gain. CHICKS COMANCHEE bumped start. JLB FIREBALL drifted early, no rally. MY ELUSIVE DREAMZ no mishap. EYE NEEDA TEQUILA broke in, bumped. BONNIE THE BAY hopped start. PERRYS DOWN DUCK came in after start, bumped. EB DIEGO GO no threat. DRUE BE FAST bumped after start.

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Post
ENTRY.OWNER: Ford Richard E and Sorenson Fred

ENTRY.NAME: Eye Needa Tequila
ENTRY.OWNER: Belloc Umberto and Quintanar Jorge Alberto

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Special Weight Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGH DOLLAR HUSH bumped at the start, set a pressured pace, drew clear on the turn and widened under mild left handed urging. MARKING'S MIRACLE was void of early speed, rallied on the turn, swung wide entering the stretch and closed to earn place while no threat to the winner. CANDY TRACK was slow early, raced outside, swung wide leaving the turn and closed to get up for show. KAYE was taken outside, raced close to the pace, rallied on the turn to loom a threat and came up empty in the drive. BEVERLY WHO broke out and bumped at the start, raced mid pack inside, angled out into the turn and lacked a bid. BYE BYE HANNAHBO came in at the start, dropped inside, was checked entering the turn, dropped back and faded. EMOTION N DEVOTION was fractious in the gate, broke a step slowly and was outrun in an even effort. SPLISH SPLASH broke awkwardly and bumped at the start, pressed the pace to the turn and gave way. JOJO'S GIRL bumped at the start, pressed the pace three across, dropped inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Marking's Miracle
ENTRY.OWNER: Kao Rose A Shaw Odell and Shaw Linda
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, swung wide leaving turn, closed, no math

ENTRY.NAME: Beverly Who
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, mid pack inside, angled out into turn, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: High Dollar Hush
ENTRY.OWNER: Amestoy Leslie A Amestoy Pierre Jean and Beasley Roger K
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, set pace, drew clear turn, widened, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Track
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, raced outside, swung wide leaving turn, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Emotion N Devotion
ENTRY.OWNER: Marr Teresa K Foote Tim Sours Jim and Wright Ed
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, off a step slowly, even effort, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Kaye
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken outside, rallied turn, loomed a threat, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Bye Bye Hannahbo
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in start, dropped inside, checked into turn, fell back,

ENTRY.NAME: Splish Splash
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkwardly, bumped, pressed pace to turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Jojo's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed 3across, dropped inside, stopped,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 3 350 Y Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, AND FIVE YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DONT TREAD ON ME TO led throughout. A FLASHIN CORONA lost footing while away well, in close, hung late. MS PAY ME FIRST veered in after break. WICKEDNWILD EAGLE clean trip. EL DIAMANTE PA veered in after start, bumped. RIVERSIDE CHICK bumped after start. FIRE OF THE DRAGON broke in air. HOLLIS G outrun. MAMACITA JJ bumped repeatedly. SIR EASY FLASH broke in, bumped. Following a stewards' inquiry, EL DIAMANTE PA was disqualified and placed ninth for causing interference at the start.

ENTRY.NAME: A Flashin Corona
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost footing while away well, in close, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Riverside Chick
ENTRY.OWNER: Driggers, Robert M. and Ivey, Ben Lee

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 4 7 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 15700. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TRUST MANDO raced close to the pace along the inside, awaited room on the turn, angled out, bid between horses, dueled through the stretch and proved best. CHUCKIES CHANCE vied throughout and was outfinished in a game effort. STRYDER raced in the second flight between horses, shifted out on the turn, bid five wide and went willingly to the wire. THE TIME'S RIGHT raced mid pack inside, bid off the rail and had little left for the drive. BOOMER WHO vied inside to the second turn, weakened and faded through the stretch. GATLING GOLD bumped at the start, was slow early, swung wide leaving the turn and improved position. REAL PENNY raced close to the pace in a wide trip, showed speed to the turn and flattened out. STELLARSBLUERIBBON passed tiring rivals in an inside trip. FRANKS DEHERE was outrun in an even effort. ROAD TO HEAT vied between horses to the second turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Trust Mando
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, awaited room turn, bid between, dueled, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Boomer Who
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside to turn, weakened, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Road to Heat
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses to 2nd turn, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: The Time's Right
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, bid off rail, little left for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Gatling Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Bell Ronnie L and Bell L Kent
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, slow early, swung wide leaving turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Chuckies Chance
ENTRY.OWNER: Alvarado Alfred and Valdez-Cabral Jr Martin M
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied throughout, outfinished, long drive, game effort

ENTRY.NAME: Real Penny
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, raced wide, speed to turn, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Stryder
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight between horses, 5wide bid, willingly to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 5 350 Y Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Purse 22800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. Non starters preferred.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST TRY DWM dueled, proved best. JUST SHAZOOMEN dueled, outfinished, gamely. JESS PAID close throughout, good effort. BAR BOUND clear path, clean trip. LIL NEWT no mishap. CINDY LOO WHO bore in. FANTASIA veered out start. SKYE CHICK outrun. OA EYE OF KING broke slowly. ONESLICKMOONSTREAKER broke in air, off slowly.

ENTRY.NAME: Bar Bound
ENTRY.OWNER: Driggers Robert M Driggers Del Rae and Ivey Ben Lee

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 68. Allowance Purse 37000. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAME ON ROOSTER broke sharply, set the pace, responded when challenged, was under pressure through the drive and held on gamely. B R KIDD ROCK pressed the pace, challenged between horses on the turn, dueled through the stretch and was outfinished in a good effort. GEORGE WHO was unhurried early, raced along the inside, awaited room on the turn, shifted out, closed willingly and didn't have enough late. MY SPECIAL MISTAKE moved up to press the pace three across, fell back on the turn and went evenly late. WEALTH N HEALTH saved ground, lacked a rally and did not threaten. BIGG LIMO raced outside, stalked the pace, fell back leaving the turn and had nothing left for the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Wealth N Health
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, lacked a rally, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: George Who
ENTRY.OWNER: Stevens Sam E and Stevens Sammy L
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, raced inside, awaited room turn, shifted out, closed

ENTRY.NAME: My Special Mistake
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up, pressed 3across, fell back turn, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: B R Kidd Rock
ENTRY.OWNER: Brooks Rodney Brooks Marty and Reid Donnie
ENTRY.COMMENT: challenged between horses turn, dueled, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Bigg Limo
ENTRY.OWNER: Medlin Billy R and Heldenbrand Ed L
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced outside, stalked pace, fell back, nothing left for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Shame On Rooster
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, responded to pressure, held on gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 7 350 Y Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 20900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EAGLE RUNNER drifted in, held well, driving. GRS STREAKER DADDY steady bid. MILLION AIR EAGLE bumped start. RETURN TO FIRE broke in, bumped. AFTER THE STORM in close, no mishap. TAURUS PR clean trip. JEEZ LOU EEZE clean trip. EL VILLE Y SU CORONA no threat. WALLSTREET PRINCE outrun. LLEGO EL AMO broke in air, off slowly.

ENTRY.NAME: Return to Fire
ENTRY.OWNER: Millan Veronica and Garcia-Reza Jesus E

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 86. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 37600. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000 OR LESS SINCE JANUARY 14 OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DIABOLICAL RULER was sent from the gate, pressed the pace, challenged for the lead on the turn, got a head in front, drew clear and held off a closing CERVEZA. CERVEZA pressed the pace four wide, fell back leaving the turn, continued to close once straightened and was gaining late. MCTHANKS was void of early speed, rallied around the turn, went widest in the drive and finished well to get up at the wire for show. TUCUM moved up inside to set a pressure pace, leveled off once headed and was caught for third. STORMIN FAST lagged early, raced inside, angled out for the drive and finished well. AMERICAN SOLO dropped inside to save ground, offered a mild bid and improved position. ON A WARPATH pressed the pace to the turn, tired and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Tucum
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up inside, set pressured pace, leveled off, caught wire 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Stormin Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged early, raced inside, angled out for drive, finished well,

ENTRY.NAME: American Solo
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped inside, saved ground, mild bid inside,

ENTRY.NAME: McThanks
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied turn, widest in drive, finished well, up wire for show

ENTRY.NAME: On a Warpath
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to turn, tired, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Diabolical Ruler
ENTRY.OWNER: Alvarado Alfred and Valdez-Cabral Jr Martin M
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to front, pressed pace, challenged turn, drew clear, held

ENTRY.NAME: Cerveza
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 4w, fell back leaving turn, steady close, gaining

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 9 350 Y Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR TWO YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZERO TO 100 under pressure, just lasted. MR PERRISIMO steady bid, just missed. WON THE SHAKE drifted out late. MISS LETHAL HERO no mishap. JESS A FRENCHY GIRL no mishap. CORONA IN THE DARK clean trip. FIRSTCHICKONTHEMOON broke slowly. QUEEN OF DRAMA bobbled a bit start. EB MY PAOLA broke slowly.

ENTRY.NAME: Zero to 100
ENTRY.OWNER: 4 J Equine LLC and Jordan Victor

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 10 6F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 39800. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDIAN EXCELLENCE raced close to the pace in traffic, was in tight past the gap, challenged for the lead on the turn, assumed command and drew off in the drive while drifting out. PASSION BELLE was in traffic early, taken outside, swung wide leaving the turn, closed well and finished second best. BAND OF GLORY bumped and was crowded at the start, raced wide and got up for show in a steady effort. RAISE OUR FLAG stalked the pace towards the outside, bid willingly to get within range, hung late and lost position. NO REGRETS N LOVE stalked the pace, fell back on the turn and lacked the needed late response. MARKED BY A STORM raced inside, angled out for the drive, swung wide and closed well. LIL MISS CASSIE bumped start, vied to the turn, fell back, leveled off and faded from contention. MISS TRICKY INDY vied to the turn, fell back and gave way. RUNNING FOR GRACE broke out and bumped at the start, trailed the field and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Marked by a Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced inside, angled out top of stretch, swung wide, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: No Regrets N Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, fell back turn, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Tricky Indy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied to turn, fell back, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Passion Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: in traffic, taken outside, swung wide leaving turn, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Indian Excellence
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight past gap, challenged turn, drew off in drive, drifted

ENTRY.NAME: Running for Grace
ENTRY.OWNER: McDonald Bryan and Lambert Casey T

ENTRY.NAME: Band of Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, crowded start, raced wide, steady effort, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Miss Cassie
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, vied to turn, fell back, leveled off, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Raise Our Flag
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, bid willingly, within range, hung late
